name: stereophonically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that separates sound into two signals and produces more natural sound: Some recorders are modified to play stereophonically. This is a stereophonically enhanced recording. Related words
stereophonic
stereophony
More examplesFewer examplesThe audio program information is recorded either monophonically or stereophonically for playback at a later time.These early broadcasts were nearly always of live music, as there were few sources of stereophonically recorded music even on tape.The two pianos are not stereophonically differentiated enough to evoke a true sense of battle.
